spell.name: Arc Lightning
entries: Lightning springs forth from your fingertips in a 30-foot cone. Each creature caught within the area must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 lightning damage and if a creature fails the save by 5 or more it is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn on a failed save. On a successful save, a creature takes half damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, it deals an additional 1d6 lightning damage, additionally the {@condition stunned} condition save decreases by 1 to a maximum of your spellcasting DC for each slot level above 3rd.
